https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/j6jMDEIebIHpZKePOZzhlEDeROW.jpg Kevin Shepard is a tech-savvy young genius who uses his intelligence to slack off. When greedy video game executive Alan Wolf gets a hold of his ideas for a video game, Kevin and his best friend Becca set off for San Francisco to make Wolf's life miserable through a series of pranks. Bigger Fatter Liar
